items.title: Here’s What to Expect From Travelers Companies’ Next Earnings Report
items.description: Travelers Companies is expected to announce its second-quarter results next month, and analysts anticipate significant double-digit earnings growth.

items.title: Travelers Announces Most Frequent Wedding Claims of 2024
items.description: HARTFORD, Conn., June 30, 2025--Ahead of peak wedding season, The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TRV) is highlighting the important role of wedding insurance. Unforeseen events, alongside common causes of loss demonstrated by Travelers wedding insurance claims, underscore the value of being prepared.
